snippet.title: Aikyam - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch the charming announcement trailer for Aikyam to meet the characters and more from this upcoming Bollywood-inspired fantasy RPG. In Aikyam, the disappearance of Aikyam's co-mayors has plunged the village into chaos, with lurking demons aiming to seize their precious heirloom, the almighty Celestial Glue, and casting the world into darkness. It’s up to Vishva, Ramli, and Guru-ji to dazzle the hearts of disgruntled villagers with extravagant turn-based battles to rally them against the demons. Aikyam will be available on PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X/S, and PC.

#Aikyam #IGN #Gaming
